metadata.description: provide a 2-13 character suffix for all resources.

If 'no', a less restrictive prompt is applied to the OpenAI Completion API. The GPT model is instructed to look for answers in the Knowledge Base, and will result in no answers coming back as 'Sorry, the query did not find a good match. Please rephrase your question'. If 'yes', then the existing restrictive prompt will be in place, as the GPT model is requested to look for answers only, and strictly only, in the Knowledge Base.
If 'no', then please supply the endpoint and key of the existing OpenAI resource in the below two fields. If 'yes', then please choose the location of the new OpenAI resource.
If 'no', then please supply the endpoint and key of the existing Redis resource in the below two fields.
If 'yes', Bing will be used as one of the tools for the LLMs to find answers. If 'no', Bing will not be used.
